topic.title: REFERRAL RATE FOR OPEN BIOPSY (PERCENTAGE OF SCREENED)
topic.shortdesc: REFERRAL RATE FOR OPEN BIOPSY (PERCENTAGE OF SCREENED) is the percentage of women who attend a Breast Screening who receive a REFERRAL REQUEST for PATHOLOGY INVESTIGATION TYPE FOR BREAST SCREENING recorded as National Code 'Diagnostic Surgery for Histology (Open Biopsy)' either directly from screening or following other Breast Assessment procedures.
